column8:
The Comfort Inn & Suites hotel is ideally located with easy access to U.S. Highway 77. The hotel is convenient to area attractions, including the Cann Memorial Gardens, Marland Estate, the Poncan Theater and Ponca City Art Center. Northern Oklahoma College Tonkawa campus is 14 miles away.

Visitors will also enjoy nearby outdoor recreational activities like golfing, hunting, fishing, boating and horseback riding. Guests are invited to take advantage of full-service features and amenities, including free high-speed Internet access and free weekday newspaper.

Enjoy our free hot breakfast featuring eggs, meat, yogurt, fresh fruit, cereal and more, including your choice of hot waffle flavors. The hotel also features an exercise room, indoor pool and hot tub.

Business travelers will appreciate the convenience of an on-site business center, access to copy and fax services, and work space in every room. In addition to standard amenities, all guest rooms feature microwaves and refrigerators. Be sure to ask about the hotel's hot tub suites. Nonsmoking rooms are also available. Coin-operated laundry facilities are located on site for added convenience.

Lake Ponca Park is 5.7 miles from the motel. Ponca City Regional Airport is 3 miles away.

This Blackwell, Oklahoma hotel is located off Interstate 35 Exit 222 and is 8 minutes’ drive from the Top of Oklahoma Historical Society Museum. Free Wi-Fi is provided across the property.

The Arkansas-Oklahoma state border is 13 minutes’ drive North of the property. Guests will also be 3.5 mi from fishing in the Chikaskia River.

This Ponca City motel is 4 miles from Lake Ponca, where travelers can enjoy swimming, hiking, fishing, and boating.  The motel offers a free hot breakfast and guestrooms with Wi-Fi.

A 42-inch flat-panel TV with premium cable channels is provided in each room at Americas Best Value Inn.   Units are fitted with a microwave and a refrigerator.

Visitors to Americas Best Inn can take advantage of the seasonal outdoor swimming pool and convenient guest laundry facility.  The front desk staff offers fax and photocopy services.

Pioneer Woman Museum is less than 5 minutes’ drive from ABVI.  Ponca City Regional Airport is 4 miles away.

Staff at the accommodation are available to give information at the 24-hour front desk.

The nearest airport is Stillwater Regional Airport, 62 miles from Super 8 by Wyndham Blackwell.

Grandma Sang's Bed & Breakfast enjoys a location in Lower Burrell, 20 miles from Carnegie Mellon University and 20 miles from University of Pittsburgh. 15 miles from Pittsburgh Zoo & PPG Aquarium and 18 miles from Chatham University, the property offers a garden and a terrace. The bed and breakfast features rooms with air conditioning, free private parking, and free Wifi.

The bed and breakfast provides guests with a patio, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster, and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. At the bed and breakfast, each unit is fitted with bed linen and towels.

Grandma Sang's Bed & Breakfast offers a continental or vegetarian breakfast. There is an on-site bar.

Andy Warhol Museum is 21 miles from the accommodation, while PNC Park is 21 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Arnold Palmer Regional Airport, 36 miles from Grandma Sang's Bed & Breakfast.

Located just off Interstate 76, this Harmarville hotel features rooms with a flat-screen cable TV and free Wi-Fi access. Central Pittsburgh is 14 miles away.

A microwave and a refrigerator are included in every room at the Quality Inn & Suites Harmarville. They have ironing facilities and an private bathroom with a hairdryer.

Visitors can use the on-site laundry facilities at the Quality Inn & Suites Harmarville. 24-hour front desk services are available, as well as free parking.

A daily continental breakfast is offered in the hotel lobby.

Boyce Park Ski Area is 20 minutes’ drive from the Quality Inn & Suites Harmarville. The Pittsburgh Zoo & PPG Aquarium is 8 miles away.
